title: Agent-Based Pervasive Computing and Machine Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic computing principles and machine learning concepts, basic proficiency in programming languages (e.g., Python)
context.additional_context: Education focused on skill acquisition applicable to real-life problem-solving, targeting professionals

learning_goals: Learners must be able to explain core architectural components of agent-based pervasive computing systems
Learners must be able to design automated decision-making systems by integrating machine learning models into agent-based environments
By analyzing real-world cases (in medical/legal/technical fields), learners can propose agent-based pervasive computing solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
